Uses of Class
org.lrdm.Network

Packages that use Network
Package
Description
org.lrdm
Package containing the domain classes of the simulator (e.g., Mirror and Link).
org.lrdm.effectors
Package containing the Effector to add Adaptation Action to the simulation.
org.lrdm.probes
Package containing the probes offered by the framework to observe its execution.
org.lrdm.topologies
Package containing topology strategies of the simulator.

    abstract int
    TopologyStrategy.getNumTargetLinks(Network n)
    Is meant to return the expected number of total links in the network according to the respective topology.

    Returns the next mirror from the network except for the mirror passed as self.

    Remove the requested amount of links from the network.
    Set<Link>
    BalancedTreeTopologyStrategy.initNetwork(Network n, Properties props)
    Initializes the network already having the amount of mirrors as specified in the properties and connects these mirrors forming a balanced tree.

    Recreates all links between the mirrors of the network to adhere to the balanced tree topology.

    Closes all current links and creates new links between all mirrors.
